transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Hello?
Executive: Ji boliye. Haan good afternoon sir, haan ji sir aap mujhe batayenge aapko concern tha buyleads ko leke. Aapne mail kiya tha na?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Ji bol raha hu aapka jo aapka jo leads hai na jo hamara relevant hai. To wo wo nahi aa rahe hai. Correct? Aur dusra baat kya hai ki maine aapko dekhiye remove lead karke diya hai aur kai baar justification bhi likha hua hai. Ki humko ye lead nahi chahiye fir bhi wo baar baar aata hai jo chahiye wo aata nahi jo nahi chahiye wo aate rehta hai.
Executive: Ek second mai bhi aapki lead khol leti hu, mai bhi baat karti hu. Remove wala is par dekhiye remove kahi pe hai?
Executive: Sir jaise aapka ye aapka jo ye services hai pharmacy management software. Nahi maine jo remove kiya hai.
Executive: Haan, abhi aapka jo main kaam main jo aapka kaam hai wo aapka hai softwares ka hai. Hmm hmm. Aapka main kaam software ka hai.
Customer: Correct correct. Ye remove.
Executive: Haan to jo aapko jo aapko leads aa rahi hai usme to sir jo mai apni side se dekh rahi hu abhi ek lead aayi thi right main accounting software ki ye to aapke paas hoga hi nahi.
Customer: Nahi mai aur dekhiye mai usse usse dekho jo remove hai jisko maine remove kiya hai.
Executive: Sir aap ek kaam kar sakte ho agar aap free ho to mai ek video meet rakh lu kya?
Customer: Nahi video meet nahi hoga mai jaise bait kar raha hu aap ek baar check karo. Mera jo activity hai uska log hai aapke paas?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Activities ka log hai?
Executive: Mere paas sir aapke buyleads ka bhi sab show kar raha hai aapke products ka bhi sab kuch show kar raha hai.
Customer: Haan to usme usme koi lead agar mai idhar se delete karta hu. Theek hai? To aapko pata chalega na ki ye lead delete hua hai?
Executive: Sir ek second mai check karti hu. Ek second.
Executive: Lead delete karne ka to mujhe kuch show nahi kar raha hai.
Executive: Lead agar aap consume karte ho to show karta hai.
Customer: Agar delete kiya to reject kiya to delete delete ya remove karke nahi aata hai isme? Jo maine kiya hai.
Executive: Aap mujhe bataoge aapne koi lead abhi agar aapne past me koi delete kiye the uska koi aapke paas screenshot wagera hoga?
Customer: Aap ek kaam kijiye aap ek kaam kijiye, theek hai? Agar aapko agar aapko nahi malum hai to aapka koi senior aadmi hai unse puchiye ki is user ke dwara mere company ke user ke dwara jo lead remove kiya hua hai, delete kiya hua hai ya kahi pe bhi hai wo list wo list chahiye.
Executive: Aap ek minute hold pe rahiye mai abhi aapki baat kara deti hu saath ke saath hi.
Customer: Aap thoda time le lo koi dikkat nahi. Aap unse discuss karo bolo ki remove lead dekhna hai. Kaun sa remove delete hai.



Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji sir haan show karti hai. Mai abhi aapko batati hu aapne recent me koi delete ki hai to.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir aapne aajkal me delete ki thi? Ya aap hamesha karte ho ki aapko jo show kar rahi hai ki aapki delete nahi hai aap sabhi leads ko delete karte ho?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kaun sa lead hai uska naam padhiye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Abhi aapne 25th October ko IT training services ki lead reject ki thi.
Customer: Kya kya fir se boliye?
Executive: Mai bol rahi hu ki aapne 25th October ko IT training services ki lead reject ki thi Petrotron softwares.
Customer: Hmm. Next. Next? Haan.
Customer: Next bataiye. Next batati hu mai aapko CAD software hai aapka. Automobile software CAD software.
Customer: Ji?
Executive: CAD software sir. Eh theek hai. Aur next? Haan okay. Next aapka automobile software hai.
Customer: Next?
Executive: Haan fir aapka ye business intelligence services hai. Automobile software hai CAD software ki aapne kaafi ki hui hai. Jo aapke paas kabhi Raipur se aayi hai kabhi Bangalore se aayi hai. Aur aur aur ek hai D D M A ya kuch is type ka aate rehte hai.
Executive: Ek second D kya bol rahe ho aap?
Customer: Aur aur aap padhte rahiye hum batayenge aapko ye kya bol rahe hai. Sir mai haan jo aapne kal tak kal tak aapne jitni bhi leads delete ki hai ya reject ki hai mai wo sab dekh pa rahi hu.
Customer: Theek hai uske baad bolo.
Executive: Haan aapne jo last kal lead ki hai wo aapne CAD software ki ki hai. Aapke paas SQL ki bhi aapne ki hui hai IT training services ki aapne ki hui hai automobile services software ki aapne sab aapne reject ki hui hai.
Customer: Jo mai jo barabar aata hai wahi wahi aate rehta hai mai uski baat kar raha hu ek aur ko dekhiye.
Executive: Haan. Isme detail maine kuch likha bhi hai. Description bhi likha hai.
Executive: Description me likha hua hai aapne. Hmm. Aap mujhe aap kal ki baat kar rahe ho sir aap mujhe ek baar specific date batao.
Customer: Aap do din back jao teen din back jao.
Executive: Do teen din back seventh November ke aas paas?
Customer: Hmm. Theek hai boliye kya hai?
Executive: Seventh November ke aas paas kuch aapne aisa likha hai?
Executive: Iska naam kya hai kuch?
Executive: Sir mai isliye to aapko bol rahi hu ki agar aap ek baar chaliye koi baat nahi aap nahi aa sakte video meet pe. Hmm. Mere paas aapki 25th October se lekar ke 9th November tak ki sabhi leads jo aapne apni side se reject ki hai wo sabhi show karegi jisme jo sabse jyada jitna data hai wo aapka CAD software hai.
Customer: Haan usko block kar dijiye.
Executive: Okay. Ye barabar aata hai maine kahi pe maine aapko block karne ke liye isme likha hua hai kahi pe.
Executive: Okay to aap acha aapke paas ye sabse jyada aata hai jisme aap karte hi nahi ho. Hmm. CAD software ho iske alawa ye jo aapka IT training services wala hai?
Customer: Theek hai usko usko block kijiye. Chaliye usko chhod dete hai to CAD wala nahi nahi kyuki CAD ki hi aapke paas almost mai bata deti hu teen che aapke paas 10 leads to sirf CAD software ki hi aayi hai 25th se leke 9th November tak. Hmm. To aapka dekhiye abhi mere ko chahiye jo medical health care doctor matlab software hota hai usse related jyada. But usme abhi kuch cheeze se aa nahi raha.
Executive: Kis se related sir?
Customer: Hospital. Hospital se related. Haan aapne mail me mention kiya hai ki aapko hospital se related chahiye. Hmm hmm. Mai ek baar check kar leti hu.

Executive: Abhi CAD software wale mai aapke deactivate kar rahi hu to fir jab aap mana kar rahe ho to. Mai kya bol raha hu. Haan block. Mai kya bol raha hu aap kya kar rahe ho. Ji. Are suniye. Block na sir. Aap kaise aap aap kaise lead lead mai jo bola maine kuch comment likha na kahi pe block karne ke liye. Aap usko thoda theek se thoda time aap aap ek kaam kijiye aap ek din ka time lo do din ka time lo theek hai aap usko dhoond lo ki maine kisko bola block karne ke liye. Aap us lead ko block karo. Ek to ye CAD software ko hi bola hai. Hmm. Mai ek ek aate rehta aapka leyland truck ka. Leyland truck is type ka aate rehta hai. Aur jo mai bol raha hu aapko. Ek second aap mujhe ye mera aap mera personal number note karo ispe aap mujhe whatsapp karna.
Customer: Hmm. Haan 63. Theek theek hai theek hai aap aap usko thoda lock dekho aapko pata chal jayega. Fir baad me baat karte hai aapse theek hai. Aap usko lock to dekhiye theek hai. Aapko pata chal jayega agar nahi chahiye to aap kisi senior aadmi se jo kaam kar rahe hai unse request kijiye ki unko ye user ke dwara jo rejected lead hai usko dekh kar ke usko block karna hai mai kaise karenge. Sir wo mujhe pata hai jo aapne kaha hai na CAD software wala. Kaha ek bhi ek bhi nahi mil raha aapka DMA kya kya faltu faltu aate rehte hai. Haan to sir jo aap batayenge mai wahi to karungi isliye to mai aapko bol rahi hu ki agar aap video meet par join ho jate ho to easy ho jayega aapke liye bhi aur mere liye bhi. Theek hai baad me baat karte hai aap aap thoda kisi aur se baat kijiye theek hai. Theek hai mai aapko shaam me call karti hu aapse dobara. Ji theek hai okay. Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Irrelevant buyleads are being received.

- Even after removing leads, they reappear.

- Wants to block certain leads.

- Wants leads related to medical/hospital software.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the removed leads.

- Executive confirmed leads can be seen.

- Executive offered a video meet.

- Executive will check the logs for removed leads.

- Executive will call back in the evening.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in the evening.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, remove leads, block leads, hospital software
